docs.title: Welcome to the UKSI Code Guide!
docs.text:
These pages will be gradually updated to include best practice guidance for those working in the UK Sport Institute and wider high performance system.

We primarily support python.

docs.title: Pages coming soon:
docs.text:
• IDE set up
  • Starting a new project
  • Coding guidelines
  • Version control
  • Collaboration
  • Style guide

For full documentation on mkdocs visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Mermaid Test
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];
